properties.sfomuseum:description: Correspondence from M. M. O’Shaughnessy, City Engineer, San Francisco Department of Public Works, to Board of Public Works, dated February 9, 1928, concerning removal of grass and hay by Millbrae Dairy Company at Mills Field Municipal Airport and subsequent unauthorized charges to City and County of San Francisco in amount of $1,531.00; from File 531.9; two ; typewritten pages with handwritten notations.
